analysis.key_quote: However, this proposed rule may end up being widely applied to positions which are not policy related, and used as a tool to gut civil servants, including ones who strive to be politically impartial and will not obstruct the goals of the President.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concerns about the potential misuse of the proposed rule to undermine civil service protections and politicize the workforce, indicating opposition to the rule's implementation.
